summary.span: 指定启动进程时使用的一组值。

span.span: Specifies a set of values that are used when you start a process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 组件一起使用。 is used together with the component. 使用 类启动进程时，除了附加到正在运行的进程外，还可以访问处理信息。When you start a process using the class, you have access to process information in addition to that available when attaching to a running process. 您可以使用 类来更好地控制所启动的进程。You can use the class for better control over the process you start. 至少必须设置 属性，无论是手动还是使用构造函数。You must at least set the property, either manually or using the constructor. 文件名为任何应用程序或文档。The file name is any application or document. 此处的文档定义为具有与之关联的打开或默认操作的任何文件类型。Here a document is defined to be any file type that has an open or default action associated with it. 可以使用 "**文件夹选项**" 对话框（可通过操作系统获得）查看计算机的已注册文件类型及其关联的应用程序。You can view registered file types and their associated applications for your computer by using the **Folder Options** dialog box, which is available through the operating system. "**高级**" 按钮会出现一个对话框，该对话框显示是否存在与特定注册文件类型相关联的打开操作。The **Advanced** button leads to a dialog box that shows whether there is an open action associated with a specific registered file type. 此外，还可以设置其他属性，这些属性定义要对该文件执行的操作。In addition, you can set other properties that define actions to take with that file. 您可以指定特定于 属性的 属性的类型的值。You can specify a value specific to the type of the property for the property. 例如，可以指定文档类型的 "打印"。For example, you can specify "print" for a document type. 此外，您还可以指定 属性值作为命令行参数传递到文件的打开过程。Additionally, you can specify property values to be command-line arguments to pass to the file's open procedure. 例如，如果在 属性中指定文本编辑器应用程序，则可以使用 属性来指定编辑器要打开的文本文件。For example, if you specify a text editor application in the property, you can use the property to specify a text file to be opened by the editor. 标准输入通常是键盘，而标准输出和标准错误通常是监视屏幕。Standard input is usually the keyboard, and standard output and standard error are usually the monitor screen. 但是，可以使用 、和 属性，使进程从文件或其他设备获取输入或将输出返回到文件或其他设备。However, you can use the , , and properties to cause the process to get input from or return output to a file or other device. 如果在 组件上使用 、或 属性，则必须先在 "" 属性上设置相应的值。If you use the , , or properties on the component, you must first set the corresponding value on the property. 否则，系统会在读取或写入流时引发异常。Otherwise, the system throws an exception when you read or write to the stream. 设置 属性以指定是否使用操作系统 shell 启动进程。Set the property to specify whether to start the process by using the operating system shell. 如果 设置为 `false`，则新进程将继承调用进程的标准输入、标准输出和标准错误流，除非分别设置为 的 、或 `true`属性。If is set to `false`, the new process inherits the standard input, standard output, and standard error streams of the calling process, unless the , , or properties, respectively, are set to `true`. 可以将任何 属性的值更改为进程启动的时间。You can change the value of any property up to the time that the process starts. 开始该过程后，更改这些值不起作用。After you start the process, changing these values has no effect. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含类级别的链接要求，该请求应用于所有成员。This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. 当直接调用方不具有完全信任权限时，将引发 。A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类启动 Internet Explorer，并将目标 Url 提供为 参数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to start Internet Explorer, providing the destination URLs as arguments. [!code-cpp[Process.Start_static#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/CPP/processstartstatic.cpp)] [!code-csharp[Process.Start_static#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/CS/processstartstatic.cs)] [!code-vb[Process.Start_static#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/VB/processstartstatic.vb)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在开始此过程之前，必须至少设置 属性。You must set at least the property before you start the process. 文件名为任何应用程序或文档。The file name is any application or document. 在这种情况下，文档被定义为具有与之关联的打开或默认操作的任何文件类型。In this case, a document is defined to be any file type that has an open or default action associated with it. 可以使用 "**文件夹选项**" 对话框（可通过操作系统获得）查看计算机的已注册文件类型及其关联的应用程序。You can view registered file types and their associated applications for your computer by using the **Folder Options** dialog box, which is available through the operating system. "**高级**" 按钮会出现一个对话框，该对话框显示是否存在与特定注册文件类型相关联的打开操作。The **Advanced** button leads to a dialog box that shows whether there is an open action associated with a specific registered file type. 另外，还可以在启动进程之前设置其他属性。Optionally, you can also set other properties before you start the process. 属性提供了要执行的操作（如 "print"）以及 属性中指示的文件。The property supplies actions to take, such as "print", with the file indicated in the property. 当系统打开文件时， 属性提供了一种将命令行参数传递给该文件的方法。The property supplies a way to pass command-line arguments to the file when the system opens it.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ArgumentList As Collection(Of String)

summary.span: 获取启动应用程序时要使用的命令行参数集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of command-line arguments to use when starting the application.

value.span: 命令行参数的集合。

span.span: A collection of command-line arguments.

remarks.format: `ArgumentList`，从 .NET Core 2.1 和 .NET Standard 2.1 开始支持， 属性彼此独立。`ArgumentList`, which is supported starting with .NET Core 2.1 and .NET Standard 2.1, and the property are independent of one another. 也就是说，分配给 `ArgumentList` 集合的字符串不用于填充 属性，分配给 属性的字符串不会解析为分配给 `ArgumentList` 集合的单个字符串。That is, the strings assigned to the `ArgumentList` collection are not used to populate the property, and the string assigned to the property is not parsed into individual strings that are assigned to `ArgumentList` collection. `ArgumentList` 比 属性更易于使用。`ArgumentList` is easier to use than the property. 由于每个字符串都已分配给集合的成员，因此您可以使用单引号分隔的多个三转义字符串。Because each string is assigned to a member of the collection, you can single- rather than triple-escape strings that are delimited by quotation marks. 例如，下面的示例将 `-full "Mary Smith"` 包含为 `ArgumentList` 集合的成员：For example, the following example include `-full "Mary Smith"` as a member of the `ArgumentList` collection: ```csharp info.ArgumentList.Add("-full \"Mary Smith\""); ``` 与 属性对应的赋值为：The corresponding assignment to the property is: ```csharp info.Arguments = "-full \"\"\"Mary Smith\"\"\"" ``` 如果使用此属性来设置命令行参数，则必须将 设置为空字符串。If you use this property to set command-line arguments, must be set to an empty string. ## Examples 此示例将两个参数添加到进程启动信息。This example adds two arguments to the process start info. ```csharp var info = new System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo("names.exe"); info.ArgumentList.Add("-first Mary"); info.ArgumentList.Add("-last Smith"); ``` ```vb Dim info As New System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo("names.exe") info.ArgumentList.Add("-first Mary") info.ArgumentList.Add("-last Smith") ```

span.span: A single string containing the arguments to pass to the target application specified in the property.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: 分配给 `Arguments` 属性的字符串的长度必须小于32699。The length of the string assigned to the `Arguments` property must be less than 32,699. 自变量由目标应用程序进行分析和解释，因此必须与该应用程序的预期保持一致。Arguments are parsed and interpreted by the target application, so must align with the expectations of that application. 对于下面的示例中所示的 .NET 应用程序，空格被解释为多个参数之间的分隔符。For .NET applications as demonstrated in the Examples below, spaces are interpreted as a separator between multiple arguments. 包含空格的单个参数必须用引号引起来，但这些引号不会传递到目标应用程序。A single argument that includes spaces must be surrounded by quotation marks, but those quotation marks are not carried through to the target application. 若要在最终分析的参数中包含引号，请将每个标记三次转义。To include quotation marks in the final parsed argument, triple-escape each mark. 如果使用此属性来设置命令行参数，则 不得包含任何元素。If you use this property to set command-line arguments, must not contain any elements. 从 .NET Core 2.1 和 .NET Standard 2.1 开始支持 `Arguments` 和 彼此之间相互独立。`Arguments` and , which is supported starting with .NET Core 2.1 and .NET Standard 2.1, are independent of one another. 也就是说，分配给 `Arguments` 属性的字符串不填充 集合， 集合的成员未分配给 `Arguments` 属性。That is, the string assigned to the `Arguments` property does not populate the collection, and the members of the collection are not assigned to the `Arguments` property. ## Examples 第一个示例创建一个小型应用程序（argsecho），该应用程序将其参数回显到控制台。The first example creates a small application (argsecho.exe) that echos its arguments to the console. 第二个示例创建一个应用程序，该应用程序调用 argsecho 来演示 `Arguments` 属性的不同变体。The second example creates an application that invokes argsecho.exe to demonstrate different variations for the `Arguments` property. [!code-cpp[Process.Start_static#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/CPP/processstartstatic3.cpp)] [!code-csharp[Process.Start_static#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/CS/processstartstatic3.cs)] [!code-vb[Process.Start_static#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/VB/processstartstatic3.vb)] [!code-cpp[Process.Start_static#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/CPP/processstartstatic2.cpp)] [!code-csharp[Process.Start_static#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/CS/processstartstatic2.cs)] [!code-vb[Process.Start_static#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/VB/processstartstatic2.vb)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要启动的应用程序或文档。

span.span: Gets or sets the application or document to start.

value.span: 要启动的应用程序的名称或某文件类型的文档的名称，该文件类型与应用程序关联并且拥有可用的默认打开操作。

span.span: The name of the application to start, or the name of a document of a file type that is associated with an application and that has a default open action available to it.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在开始此过程之前，必须至少设置 属性。You must set at least the property before you start the process. 文件名为任何应用程序或文档。The file name is any application or document. 文档定义为具有与之关联的打开或默认操作的任何文件类型。A document is defined to be any file type that has an open or default action associated with it. 可以使用 "**文件夹选项**" 对话框（可通过操作系统获得）查看计算机的已注册文件类型及其关联的应用程序。You can view registered file types and their associated applications for your computer by using the **Folder Options** dialog box, which is available through the operating system. "**高级**" 按钮会出现一个对话框，该对话框显示是否存在与特定注册文件类型相关联的打开操作。The **Advanced** button leads to a dialog box that shows whether there is an open action associated with a specific registered file type. 可供您使用的文件类型集取决于 属性的值。The set of file types available to you depends in part on the value of the property. 如果 `true`，则可以启动任何文档，并对该文件执行操作（如打印）以及 组件。If is `true`, you can start any document and perform operations on the file, such as printing, with the component. `false` 时，只能启动具有 组件的可执行文件。When is `false`, you can start only executables with the component. 可以通过将 属性设置为最初安装应用程序的位置（例如，Web 地址）来启动 ClickOnce 应用程序。You can start a ClickOnce application by setting the property to the location (for example, a Web address) from which you originally installed the application. 不要通过在硬盘上指定它的安装位置来启动 ClickOnce 应用程序。Do not start a ClickOnce application by specifying its installed location on your hard disk. ## Examples [!code-cpp[Process.Start_instance#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_instance/CPP/processstart.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Process.Start_instance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_instance/CS/processstart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Process.Start_instance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_instance/VB/processstart.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果正在使用用户名、密码和域启动进程，则引用此属性。This property is referenced if the process is being started by using the user name, password, and domain. 如果 `true`值，则会加载 `HKEY_USERS` 注册表项中的用户配置文件。If the value is `true`, the user's profile in the `HKEY_USERS` registry key is loaded. 加载配置文件可能非常耗时。Loading the profile can be time-consuming. 因此，仅当必须访问 `HKEY_CURRENT_USER` 注册表项中的信息时，才最好使用此值。Therefore, it is best to use this value only if you must access the information in the `HKEY_CURRENT_USER` registry key. 在 Windows Server 2003 和 Windows 2000 中，在新进程终止后，该配置文件将被卸载，无论进程是否创建了子进程。In Windows Server 2003 and Windows 2000, the profile is unloaded after the new process has been terminated, regardless of whether the process has created child processes. 在 Windows XP 中，配置文件在新进程已终止后被卸载。In Windows XP, the profile is unloaded after the new process and all child processes it has created have been terminated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果提供了 和 ，则必须设置 属性。The property must be set if and are provided. 如果未设置该属性，则默认工作目录为%Systemroot%\system32If the property is not set, the default working directory is %SYSTEMROOT%\system32. > [!NOTE] > 若要启动具有用户凭据的进程，建议在 对象中设置 、和 属性。Setting the , , and the properties in a object is the recommended practice for starting a process with user credentials. 对象类似于 对象，因为它具有一个文本值。A object is like a object in that it has a text value. 但是， 对象的值将自动加密，因此可以对其进行修改，直到应用程序将其标记为只读，并可通过应用程序或 .NET Framework 垃圾回收器将其从计算机内存中删除。However, the value of a object is automatically encrypted, it can be modified until your application marks it as read-only, and it can be deleted from computer memory by either your application or the .NET Framework garbage collector. 有关安全字符串和如何获取用于设置此属性的密码的示例的详细信息，请参见 类。For more information about secure strings and an example of how to obtain a password to set this property, see the class. > [!NOTE] > 如果为 属性提供一个值， 属性必须 `false`，否则在调用 方法时将引发 。If you provide a value for the property, the property must be `false`, or an will be thrown when the method is called.

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否将应用程序的错误输出写入 流中的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the error output of an application is written to the stream.

value.span: 如果错误输出应写入 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if error output should be written to ; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 向其标准错误流写入文本时，该文本通常显示在控制台上。When a writes text to its standard error stream, that text is typically displayed on the console. 通过重定向 流，你可以操作或取消进程的错误输出。By redirecting the stream, you can manipulate or suppress the error output of a process. 例如，你可以筛选文本，以不同的方式对其进行格式设置，或者将输出写入控制台和指定的日志文件。For example, you can filter the text, format it differently, or write the output to both the console and a designated log file. > [!NOTE] > 如果要将 设置为 `true`，则必须将 设置为 `false`。You must set to `false` if you want to set to `true`. 否则，从 流中读取会引发异常。Otherwise, reading from the stream throws an exception. 重定向的 流可以同步或异步读取。The redirected stream can be read synchronously or asynchronously. 、 和 等方法执行进程的错误输出流上的同步读取操作。Methods such as , and perform synchronous read operations on the error output stream of the process. 在关联的 写入其 流或关闭流之前，这些同步读取操作不会完成。These synchronous read operations do not complete until the associated writes to its stream, or closes the stream. 与此相反， 会对 流启动异步读取操作。In contrast, starts asynchronous read operations on the stream. 此方法将为流输出启用指定的事件处理程序，并立即返回到调用方，当流输出定向到事件处理程序时，该处理程序可以执行其他操作。This method enables a designated event handler for the stream output and immediately returns to the caller, which can perform other work while the stream output is directed to the event handler. > [!NOTE] > 处理异步输出的应用程序应调用 方法，以确保刷新了输出缓冲区。The application that is processing the asynchronous output should call the method to ensure that the output buffer has been flushed. 同步读取操作会在调用方之间引入依赖关系，从 流读取，子进程写入该流。Synchronous read operations introduce a dependency between the caller reading from the stream and the child process writing to that stream. 这些依赖项可能会导致死锁情况。These dependencies can cause deadlock conditions. 当调用方从子进程的重定向流中进行读取时，它依赖于子进程。When the caller reads from the redirected stream of a child process, it is dependent on the child. 调用方等待读取操作，直到子级写入流或关闭流为止。The caller waits for the read operation until the child writes to the stream or closes the stream. 当子进程写入足够的数据以填充其重定向流时，它依赖于父进程。When the child process writes enough data to fill its redirected stream, it is dependent on the parent. 子进程等待下一次写入操作，直到父进程从整个流中读取或关闭流为止。The child process waits for the next write operation until the parent reads from the full stream or closes the stream. 当调用方和子进程等待彼此完成操作时，就会发生死锁条件，这两种情况都不会继续。The deadlock condition results when the caller and child process wait for each other to complete an operation, and neither can continue. 您可以通过计算调用方和子进程之间的依赖关系来避免死锁。You can avoid deadlocks by evaluating dependencies between the caller and child process. 本节中的最后两个示例使用 方法来启动一个名为*Write500Lines*的可执行文件。The last two examples in this section use the method to launch an executable named *Write500Lines.exe*. 下面的示例包含它的源代码。The following example contains its source code. [!code-csharp[Executable launched by Process.Start](~/samples/snippets/csharp/api/system.diagnostics/process/standardoutput/write500lines.cs)] [!code-vb[Executable launched by Process.Start](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/api/system.diagnostics/process/standardoutput/write500lines.vb)] 下面的示例演示如何从重定向的错误流中读取并等待子进程退出。The following example shows how to read from a redirected error stream and wait for the child process to exit. 它通过在 `p.WaitForExit`之前调用 `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` 来避免死锁情况。It avoids a deadlock condition by calling `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` before `p.WaitForExit`. 如果父进程在 `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` 之前调用了 `p.WaitForExit`，并且子进程写入足够多的文本以填充重定向的流，则会导致死锁情况。A deadlock condition can result if the parent process calls `p.WaitForExit` before `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` and the child process writes enough text to fill the redirected stream. 父进程会无限期地等待子进程退出。The parent process would wait indefinitely for the child process to exit. 子进程会无限期地等待父进程从完整的 流中读取。The child process would wait indefinitely for the parent to read from the full stream. [!code-csharp[Reading from the error stream](~/samples/snippets/csharp/api/system.diagnostics/process/standarderror/stderror-sync.cs)] [!code-vb[Reading from the error stream](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/api/system.diagnostics/process/standarderror/stderror-sync.vb)] 从标准输出和标准错误流中读取所有文本时，会出现类似的问题。There is a similar issue when you read all text from both the standard output and standard error streams. 例如， C#下面的代码对这两个流执行读取操作。The following C# code, for example, performs a read operation on both streams. 它通过对 流执行异步读取操作来避免死锁情况。It avoids the deadlock condition by performing asynchronous read operations on the stream. 如果父进程调用 `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` 后跟 `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` 并且子进程写入足够多的文本以填充其错误流，则会导致死锁情况。A deadlock condition results if the parent process calls `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` followed by `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` and the child process writes enough text to fill its error stream. 父进程会无限期地等待子进程关闭其 流。The parent process would wait indefinitely for the child process to close its stream. 子进程会无限期地等待父进程从完整的 流中读取。The child process would wait indefinitely for the parent to read from the full stream. [!code-csharp[Reading from both streams](~/samples/snippets/csharp/api/system.diagnostics/process/standardoutput/stdoutput-async.cs)] [!code-vb[Reading from both streams](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/api/system.diagnostics/process/standardoutput/stdoutput-async.vb)] 您可以使用异步读取操作来避免这些依赖项及其死锁。You can use asynchronous read operations to avoid these dependencies and their deadlock potential. 或者，您可以通过创建两个线程并在单独的线程上读取每个流的输出来避免出现死锁情况。Alternately, you can avoid the deadlock condition by creating two threads and reading the output of each stream on a separate thread. ## Examples 下面的示例将 `net use` 命令与用户提供的参数一起使用，以映射网络资源。The following example uses the `net use` command together with a user-supplied argument to map a network resource. 然后，它读取 net 命令的标准错误流并将其写入控制台。It then reads the standard error stream of the net command and writes it to console. [!code-cpp[Process_StandardError#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process_StandardError/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Process_StandardError#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process_StandardError/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Process_StandardError#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process_StandardError/VB/source.vb#1)]

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以从其标准输入流（通常是键盘）读取输入文本。A can read input text from its standard input stream, typically the keyboard. 通过重定向 流，你可以通过编程方式指定进程的输入。By redirecting the stream, you can programmatically specify the input of a process. 例如，可以从指定文件的内容或其他应用程序的输出中提供文本，而不使用键盘输入。For example, instead of using keyboard input, you can provide text from the contents of a designated file or output from another application. > [!NOTE] > 如果要将 设置为 `true`，则必须将 设置为 `false`。You must set to `false` if you want to set to `true`. 否则，写入 流时将引发异常。Otherwise, writing to the stream throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重定向进程的 流。The following example illustrates how to redirect the stream of a process. `sort` 命令是一种控制台应用程序，用于读取和排序文本输入。The `sort` command is a console application that reads and sorts text input. 该示例通过重定向的输入启动 `sort` 命令。The example starts the `sort` command with redirected input. 然后，它会提示用户输入文本，并通过重定向的 流将文本传递到 `sort` 进程。It then prompts the user for text, and passes the text to the `sort` process through the redirected stream. `sort` 结果在控制台上显示给用户。The `sort` results are displayed to the user on the console. [!code-cpp[Process_StandardInput#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process_StandardInput/CPP/process_standardinput.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Process_StandardInput#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process_StandardInput/CS/process_standardinput.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Process_StandardInput#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process_StandardInput/VB/process_standardinput.vb#1)]

for each other to complete an operation, and neither can continue. 您可以通过计算调用方和子进程之间的依赖关系来避免死锁。You can avoid deadlocks by evaluating dependencies between the caller and child process. 本节中的最后两个示例使用 方法来启动一个名为*Write500Lines*的可执行文件。The last two examples in this section use the method to launch an executable named *Write500Lines.exe*. 下面的示例包含它的源代码。The following example contains its source code. [!code-csharp[Executable launched by Process.Start](~/samples/snippets/csharp/api/system.diagnostics/process/standardoutput/write500lines.cs)] [!code-vb[Executable launched by Process.Start](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/api/system.diagnostics/process/standardoutput/write500lines.vb)] 下面的示例演示如何从重定向流中读取并等待子进程退出。The following example shows how to read from a redirected stream and wait for the child process to exit. 该示例通过在 `p.WaitForExit`之前调用 `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` 来避免死锁情况。The example avoids a deadlock condition by calling `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` before `p.WaitForExit`. 如果父进程在 `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` 之前调用了 `p.WaitForExit`，并且子进程写入足够多的文本以填充重定向的流，则会导致死锁情况。A deadlock condition can result if the parent process calls `p.WaitForExit` before `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` and the child process writes enough text to fill the redirected stream. 父进程会无限期地等待子进程退出。The parent process would wait indefinitely for the child process to exit. 子进程会无限期地等待父进程从完整的 流中读取。The child process would wait indefinitely for the parent to read from the full stream. [!code-csharp[Reading synchronously from a redirected output stream](~/samples/snippets/csharp/api/system.diagnostics/process/standardoutput/stdoutput-sync.cs)] [!code-vb[Reading synchronously from a redirected output stream](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/api/system.diagnostics/process/standardoutput/stdoutput-sync.vb)] 从标准输出和标准错误流中读取所有文本时，会出现类似的问题。There is a similar issue when you read all text from both the standard output and standard error streams. 下面的示例对两个流执行读取操作。The following example performs a read operation on both streams. 它通过对 流执行异步读取操作来避免死锁情况。It avoids the deadlock condition by performing asynchronous read operations on the stream. 如果父进程调用 `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` 后跟 `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` 并且子进程写入足够多的文本以填充其错误流，则会导致死锁情况。A deadlock condition results if the parent process calls `p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd` followed by `p.StandardError.ReadToEnd` and the child process writes enough text to fill its error stream. 父进程会无限期地等待子进程关闭其 流。The parent process would wait indefinitely for the child process to close its stream. 子进程会无限期地等待父进程从完整的 流中读取。The child process would wait indefinitely for the parent to read from the full stream. [!code-csharp[Reading from a redirected output and error stream](~/samples/snippets/csharp/api/system.diagnostics/process/standardoutput/stdoutput-async.cs)] [!code-vb[Reading from a redirected output and error stream](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/api/system.diagnostics/process/standardoutput/stdoutput-async.vb)] 您可以使用异步读取操作来避免这些依赖项及其死锁。You can use asynchronous read operations to avoid these dependencies and their deadlock potential. 或者，您可以通过创建两个线程并在单独的线程上读取每个流的输出来避免出现死锁情况。Alternately, you can avoid the deadlock condition by creating two threads and reading the output of each stream on a separate thread. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ProcessOneStream#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ProcessOneStream/CPP/stdstr.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProcessOneStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ProcessOneStream/CS/stdstr.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProcessOneStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ProcessOneStream/VB/stdstr.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为 `false` 可重定向输入、输出和错误流。Setting this property to `false` enables you to redirect input, output, and error streams. 此上下文（`UseShellExecute`）中的 "shell" 一词是指图形 shell （类似于 Windows shell）而不是命令行界面（例如，`bash` 或 `sh`），允许用户启动图形应用程序或打开的文档。The word "shell" in this context (`UseShellExecute`) refers to a graphical shell (similar to the Windows shell) rather than command shells (for example, `bash` or `sh`) and lets users launch graphical applications or open documents. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性 `null` 为或空字符串，则 必须 `false`，否则在调用 方法时将引发 。 must be `false` if the property is not `null` or an empty string, or an will be thrown when the method is called. 在使用操作系统 shell 启动进程时，可以使用 对象启动任何文档（可以是与具有默认打开操作的可执行文件关联的任何注册文件）并对该文件执行操作（如打印）。When you use the operating system shell to start processes, you can start any document (which is any registered file type associated with an executable that has a default open action) and perform operations on the file, such as printing, by using the object. 当 为 `false` 时，仅可使用 对象启动可执行文件。When is `false`, you can start only executables by using the object. > [!NOTE] > 如果将 属性设置为 `true`，则必须 `true` 。 must be `true` if you set the property to `true`. 如果将 设置为 "，则 必须设置为" `true`"。If you set the to , must be set to `true`. ### WorkingDirectoryWorkingDirectory 属性的行为随 属性的值而异。The property behaves differently depending on the value of the property. `true` 时， 属性指定可执行文件的位置。When is `true`, the property specifies the location of the executable. 如果 是一个空字符串，则假定当前目录包含可执行文件。If is an empty string, it is assumed that the current directory contains the executable. 当 `false` 时， 属性不用于查找可执行文件。When is `false`, the property is not used to find the executable. 相反，它只能由已启动的进程使用，并且仅在新进程的上下文中有意义。Instead, it is used only by the process that is started and has meaning only within the context of the new process. `false` 时， 属性可以是可执行文件的完全限定路径，也可以是系统将在 PATH 环境变量指定的文件夹内尝试查找的简单可执行名称。When is `false`, the property can be either a fully qualified path to the executable, or a simple executable name that the system will attempt to find within folders specified by the PATH environment variable. ## Examples remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果提供了 和 ，则必须设置 属性。The property must be set if and are provided. 如果未设置该属性，则默认工作目录为%Systemroot%\system32If the property is not set, the default working directory is %SYSTEMROOT%\system32. 如果该目录已是系统路径变量的一部分，则无需在此属性中重复该目录的位置。If the directory is already part of the system path variable, you do not have to repeat the directory's location in this property. 当 `true` 与 `false`时， 属性的行为有所不同。The property behaves differently when is `true` than when is `false`. `true` 时， 属性指定可执行文件的位置。When is `true`, the property specifies the location of the executable. 如果 为空字符串，则了解当前目录，以包含可执行文件。If is an empty string, the current directory is understood to contain the executable. > [!NOTE] > 当 是 `true` 时，启动可执行文件的应用程序的工作目录也是该可执行文件的工作目录。When is `true`, the working directory of the application that starts the executable is also the working directory of the executable. 当 `false` 时， 属性不用于查找可执行文件。When is `false`, the property is not used to find the executable. 相反，其值应用于已启动的进程，并且仅在新进程的上下文中有意义。Instead, its value applies to the process that is started and only has meaning within the context of the new process.
